name: Silencio
description: Silencio Network is the largest decentralized environmental intelligence platform, built to revolutionize how the world addresses noise pollution. It empowers individuals to transform their smartphones into hyper-local noise sensors, creating the most comprehensive and actionable noise data repository globally. Leveraging blockchain technology and incentivization through $SLC, Silencio bridges the gap between decentralized technology and real-world applications, tackling one of the most overlooked global challenges: noise pollution. Silencio stands at the forefront of the Decentralized Physical Infrastructure Networks (DePIN) movement, setting new standards for community-driven data collection, transparency, and environmental impact.
